mapper.select: select pNo ,min(currPrice) currPrice, format(min(currPrice), 0) AcurrPrice, currDate from tbl_price_history where pNo = #{pNo} group by date(currDate)

select p.*,format(p.pLowest, 0) rPLowest, format(t.notifyPrice, 0) notifyPrice, t.email from tbl_product p inner join tbl_tracking t on p.pNo = t.pNo where t.email = #{email} and t.notifyPrice >= p.pLowest order by pNo desc

select p.*,format(p.pLowest, 0) rPLowest, format(t.notifyPrice, 0) notifyPrice, t.email from tbl_product p inner join tbl_tracking t on p.pNo = t.pNo where t.email = #{email} and p.pLowest > t.notifyPrice order by pNo desc limit 0, 10;
select p.*, t.notifyPrice, t.email from tbl_product p inner join tbl_tracking t on p.pNo = t.pNo where t.email = #{email} and p.pLowest > t.notifyPrice order by pNo desc limit #{begin}, 10;
